name: Divani Caravel Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is excellent, perfect mix of luxury and comfort. The pool in the highest floor has a magnificent view of sunset thru Acropolis, very magical! Rooms are wide enough, nice bathroom, friendly staff who recommended good places.
reviews.title: Perfect hotel, very convenient location

reviews.text: Location is fantastic, nice walk toward Acropolis, touristic places (Plaka, Thission, Psyri), restaurants, markets, etc.
reviews.title: Perfect stay if you want to be treated like a king! You'll always remember your stay there!

reviews.text: If you travel there, you would like to know that most of maps are in English, so if you have the choice to take a Greek one, just do it since the road names are in greek, so believe me, really hard to match both when you have "symbols" there. Anyway, everybody speaks English and all the people is very nice.
reviews.title: Wedding Weekend

reviews.text: The hotel is in a perfect location. There is also a minibus taking the residents of the hotel- free of charge- to the centre and to shopping areas. Same way for return to the hotel, at established hours.
reviews.title: Services, locatoin and staff was OK!

reviews.text: The rooms are great, lots of space, clean, elegant and full of good taste.
reviews.title: Comfortable room, great breakfast
Disappointed, since it is branded as a "Leading Hotels of The World" chain
reviews.text: I had high expectations since it was branded as a "LHW" Hotel, as most LHW hotels that I have stayed at were very good quality with an interesting experience. However, this one was not up to standard
Pros
reviews.title: Great stay for luxury vacation

reviews.text: - Internet was fast (even though you had to pay)
reviews.title: Good quality for a good price

reviews.text: - Staff service was quite friendly
reviews.title: Outstanding Hotel

reviews.text: - Breakfast buffet selection was huge and food were delicious
reviews.title: Still going strong

reviews.text: There is nothing special during my stay. Just that water kept leaking out which made the floor very wet and slippery when having a shower.
reviews.title: Old style hotel

reviews.text: I recently visited this hotel with a group of 140 people from San Juan, Puerto Rico. I have to take my hat off to the staff at the front desk, not only did they have all of our keys and registration ready when we got there, but they were able to adjust room for those who had special intrest need, without any problem. The food at the hotel was excellent and room service was a A+++
reviews.title: Royal treatment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you want a large room, comfortable king size bed, good restaurant, this is a good choice. It was not as centrally located as I would have liked but the service was good and we had a view of the Parthenon from our room. There is also a beautiful pool and spa on the top floor with great views of the city.
reviews.title: Very comfortable room!

reviews.text: We stayed at the Divani Caravel for a few days as part of a guided tour to Greece. we did not know what to expect. we were worried that language barrier and distance from Plaka was going to be issue. We were wrong. Everyone in the hotel speaks English. The staff is very friendly and always eager to help. The hotel has a shuttle to downtown that is very convenient. We opted to walk instead - the city is very safe. Lots of locals walking their dogs in the evening hours. There are a lot of good restaurants closeby if you are looking for more affordable options vs. eating at the hotel. We recommend the hotel to business or leasure. Internet connection is great. The swimming pool is really nice. The night time view of major hills, including the Acropolis is unforgetable!
reviews.title: Great and safe location. Excellent breakfast. Friendly staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Huge business style hotel in a good area in Athens. Although a bit out of fashion, we took a cheap offer and also were upgraded to a superior room which was great.
reviews.title: Good hotel to explore Athens

reviews.text: Recently stayed at the Divani Caravel Hotel in Athens which is located in a mostly residential area about a 5 minute walk from the Metra (which is easy to navigate). It looks like it used to be a very busy convention hotel but was subdued when we were there. It also looks a little dated but you don't sleep in the lobby! The rooms are clean, nicely sized and the showers/bath were fine. We booked it through their website and got a pretty good deal, especially for Athens. Breakfast is stupid expensive (30euro if you didn't purchase it as a package). There are several restaurants nearby none of them really serves what I would describe as an American breakfast - mostly coffee and perhaps a pastry.
reviews.title: good experience

reviews.text: Very nice clean quite hotel, with good restaurant, very beautiful fitness club on top, sauna and beauty saloon. A little expensive but is a standard as a five star hotel.
reviews.title: Good place to stay but a little bit far from city center

reviews.text: The only thing is that is far from city center so you have to take a taxi or walk for 5 minutes to take a metro.
reviews.title: Charming, friendly, and comfortable

reviews.text: The pool in the summer should be a good place to stay but in November is too cold to try it :)
reviews.title: Depends on the room

reviews.text: Very nice place to stay very quite.
reviews.title: Great location.

description: Divani Caravel is a 5 star hotel ideally situated in central Athens. A member of The Leading Hotels of the World, Divani Caravel exemplifies refined luxury and exceptional service. Our hotel accommodation features 471 rooms (40 suites and 2 presidential suites). Facilities: health club and spa, swimming pool and fitness centre. Divani Caravel also hosts memorable events and weddings in its elegant meeting settings and restaurants.
